settings.title: Trade Account
settings.content: Trade accounts can be beneficial for everyone from local tradesmen to main contractors. We're able to offer individual pricing, a wide range of products and of course credit terms that help you manage your cash flow. Apply today!

settings.title: Authorised Reseller Benefits
settings.content: Whether you're an individual agent or e-commerce store looking to expand your offering, the Soundbox Store own-brand range is available for resellers. Apply below to find out more about opportunities to partner with Soundbox Store!

settings.title: Dedicated Account Manager
settings.content:
With a direct port of call you can save a lot of time by not having to ring or email around trying to find the right person for your query. You will also receive visits
regular visits or Teams calls to offer product training to your staff.

settings.title: Discounted Showroom Stock
settings.content: Take advantage of additional discounts for showroom stock – let your clients try the products for themselves.

settings.title: Competitive Pricing
settings.content: We constantly monitor the Acoustic market to ensure we are always giving you the most competitive pricing.

settings.title: Easy Procurement
settings.content: Most of our products are already on the website, however sometimes we can supply various products by going straight to the source for you.

settings.title: Quality Products
settings.content: As a Reseller you have direct access to all our products, all manufactured to the highest standards, with innovative technology

settings.title: Logistical support and Real time stock availability
settings.content: Our customer service department are on hand to advise of stock availability and delivery and installation timescales.

settings.title: New Launches
settings.content: Be amongst the first to know about any new launches/ranges we are bringing to the market and access to exclusive events.

settings.title: Resources
settings.content:
As an authorised SoundBox Store Reseller, you will have access to the product to download CAD blocks and Sketchup models to use in your inhouse designs,
product PDF’s, Technical specificatons and environmental credentials.

settings.title: Design resource
settings.content: If you do not have an inhouse design resource, we can help you provide a 3D design to your client. Providing you can send us a floor plan with dimensions.

settings.title: Marketing Materials
settings.content: Once you are up and running, we will supply you with a Reseller pack containing printed collateral, high resolution renders and Soundbox Store merchandise

settings.title: Trade Account
settings.content: Trade accounts can be beneficial for everyone from local tradesmen to main contractors. We're able to offer individual pricing, a wide range of products and of course credit terms that help you manage your cash flow. Apply today!

settings.title: Authorised Reseller Benefits
settings.content: Whether you're an individual agent or e-commerce store looking to expand your offering, the Soundbox Store own-brand range is available for resellers. Apply below to find out more about opportunities to partner with Soundbox Store!

settings.title: Dedicated Account Manager
settings.content: With a direct port of call you can save a lot of time by not having to ring or email around trying to find the right person for your query.

settings.title: Competitive Pricing
settings.content: Understanding your needs better means we'll be able to provide you with the best prices and discounts where available.

settings.title: Easy Product Sourcing
settings.content: A large majority of our products are already on the site, however sometimes we are able to offer alternatives or different options by going straight to the source for you.

settings.title: Save Time, Save Money
settings.content: We will save your business money by reducing sourcing and procurement admin time. You can place orders from multiple world class manufacturers, with only one invoice and payment required.

settings.title: Quality Products
settings.content: As a Reseller you'd have direct access to all of our own brand products, all manufactured to be the best quality.

settings.title: New Launches
settings.content: Be amongst the first to know about any new launches/ranges we have coming up and have plenty of time to prepare for orders to come flying in.

settings.title: Contract Manager
settings.content: With a direct contact here you'll save a lot of time not having to ring around or email trying to find the correct person. It also means they'll be able to get in touch if we have any big announcements/launches.

settings.title: Dedicated Marketing Materials
settings.content: Once everything is arranged we'll be able to work with you to supply any Muffle related marketing you may need, including a lot of our own High-Res renders.
